hero.headline: Infrastructure management made simple for modern teams
hero.subheadline: A unified platform to manage servers, agents, containers and domains with clarity and control.

features.title: Everything you need to manage your infrastructure
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed for modern server management and deployment workflows.

workspace.title: Workspace-based management
workspace.description: Organize your infrastructure with isolated workspaces for different projects and teams.

agents.title: Agent-controlled servers
agents.description: Deploy lightweight agents that manage and monitor your servers autonomously.

docker.title: Docker container management
docker.description: Full Docker support with container orchestration and lifecycle management.

domain.title: Domain & DNS control
domain.description: Manage domains, DNS records, and SSL certificates from a single interface.

dashboard.title: Unified dashboard
dashboard.description: Monitor all your servers, containers, and services from one central dashboard.

security.title: Secure & scalable
security.description: Enterprise-grade security with automatic scaling and load balancing.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in minutes with our simple three-step process.

step1.title: Create a workspace
step1.description: Set up your first workspace to organize your infrastructure projects.

step2.title: Install agents
step2.description: Deploy lightweight agents on your servers to enable remote management.

step3.title: Deploy services
step3.description: Deploy Docker containers, applications, and services with one click.

step4.title: Manage everything in one place
step4.description: Monitor, scale, and manage all your infrastructure from the unified dashboard.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure & Global Presence
infrastructure.subtitle: Deploy your infrastructure across 15+ regions worldwide with enterprise-grade reliability, low latency, and 24/7 support.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: One plan. Everything you need to manage your infrastructure.

cta.title: Simplify your infrastructure management
cta.subtitle: Unified platform to manage servers, agents, and containers with full control and real-time visibility.

info.headline: Know when your
info.description: CorsiHub is a central hub to register agents, monitor status, and ensure confidence in distributed services.

features.title: Centralized infrastructure management
features.description: CorsiHub provides a unified platform to manage agents, monitor infrastructure status, and maintain distributed services.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure under control
infrastructure.description: Manage servers, agents and containers from a single centralized panel, with full visibility and operational control.

automation.title: Intelligent automation
automation.description: Deployments, monitoring and service management done automatically, reducing failures and increasing efficiency.

agents.title: Agent-based management
agents.description: Each server connected through secure agents, ensuring reliable and scalable communication across your infrastructure.

docker.title: Integrated Docker orchestration
docker.description: Create, start, stop and monitor Docker containers directly from the dashboard, without external tools.

domains.title: Unified domains and services
domains.description: Manage domains, applications and hosting in a single workspace, simplifying complex operations.

teams.title: Built for teams
teams.description: Organized workspaces, clear permissions and professional management for technical teams and growing companies.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your registered email and we will send you a code to reset your password.
forgotPassword.successDescription: We've sent a reset code to your email. Please check your inbox.
